THE STRICT SCRUTINY TEST
As soon as Plessywas decided, Southern and some border states rapidly
passed a whole series of segregation laws. These were subsequently upheld
by the courts on the precedent of Plessyand its separate-but-equal doctrine.
The result was the introduction of a system of racial segregation throughout
much of the country.
